channel.title: Clear this Up
channel.description: Ok now when I zip my cache, Do i zip EVERY SINGLE THING, as in all the .dat files not just the folders and subfolders, i mean EVERY SINGLE FILE IN THE CACHE? Like everything IN not just jframe, maps, npc, models, data, etc?

item.title: Clear this Up
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

You zip everything except the cache folder itself.

Read full topic
